LBRY URIs must include a protocol prefix: LBRY URIs must include a protocol prefix (lbry://).

Received a channel content URI, but name: Received a channel content URI, but name and channelName do not match. "name" represents the value in the name position of the URI (lbry://name...), which for channel content will be the channel name. In most cases, to construct a channel URI you should just pass channelName and contentName.
